channel.title: math.KT updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.KT updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: A note on weight filtrations at the characteristic
item.description: arXiv:2502.19626v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: We show that logarithmic variants of ($p$-adic) cohomology theories admit a canonical weight filtration on resolvable motives, for example on the motive associated to a projective relative strict normal crossing divisor pair. Our methods apply to $\kgl$-linear cohomology theories on smooth schemes over Dedekind domains. Importantly, the produced filtrations are invariants of the open part of the log scheme, thus providing new, computable invariants of smooth schemes admitting a good compactification.
item.dc:creator: Toni Annala, Piotr Pstr\k{a}gowski

item.title: Witt groups of Severi-Brauer varieties and of function fields of conics
item.description: arXiv:2304.03539v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: The Witt group of skew hermitian forms over a division algebra $D$ with symplectic involution is shown to be canonically isomorphic to the Witt group of symmetric bilinear forms over the Severi-Brauer variety of $D$ with values in a suitable line bundle. In the special case where $D$ is a quaternion algebra we extend previous work by Pfister and by Parimala on the Witt group of conics to set up two five-terms exact sequences relating the Witt groups of hermitian or skew-hermitian forms over $D$ with the Witt groups of the center, of the function field of the Severi-Brauer conic of $D$, and of the residue fields at each closed point of the conic.
item.arxiv:journal_reference: \'Epijournal de G\'eometrie Alg\'ebrique, Volume 9 (2025), Article no. 4
item.dc:creator: Anne Qu\'eguiner-Mathieu, Jean-Pierre Tignol

item.title: The Arens-Michael envelope of a solvable Lie algebra is a homological epimorphism
item.description: arXiv:2404.19433v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: The Arens-Michael envelope of the universal enveloping algebra of a finite-dimensional complex Lie algebra is a homological epimorphism if and only if the Lie algebra is solvable. The necessity was proved by Pirkovskii in [Proc. Amer. Math. Soc. 134, 2621--2631, 2006]. We prove the sufficiency.
item.dc:creator: Oleg Aristov
